channel.title: Webclient

I got a source and client but how to make a webclient on (mm-scape.webs.com) It´s mine.
PLEASE ANSWER.

item.title: Webclient

item.description:
@MMSCAPE wrote:

I did but how to upload client.jar? all files in client or onlu start client?

and how to make jar?

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

Google is an amazing tool, sir. I found this Moparscape post via Google.

[quote author=noobofiyer link=topic=464709.msg3398449#msg3398449 date=1289689491]

[quote=“wboar, post:4, topic:368559”]I page editor you should see a HTML button. Open it and coppy there this:

[code]

YOUR CLIENT

NOTE:

[/code]

Then Click on Publish button, Then there should come up a window “Published! Now what?”
Just click there --> Publish all pages. Then it should redict you to “Site manager” page.
There you should see a button called “File manager” click on it. Then click on “Single File Uploader” and upload your webclient there (client.jar).
Now your webclient should work. :D[/quote]

Read full topic
